column4: Does anyone know why video would be slower on ubuntu than fedora if the ubuntu computer has a faster processor, and more ram
Drac[Server] , fedora uses a card without acc ubuntu has acc
Drac[Server] , thanks for that , i will run glxgears when i get a chance but right now i'm transcoding a video
run glxgears -printfps to get a readout of frames per sec
